name: Chess Survivors
description:
Chess Survivors is a grid based, quick-turn, roguelike where you outmaneuver and destroy an ever growing horde of chess based enemies. Combine abilities, upgrades, and relics to create game-breaking builds. Think fast, die, learn, repeat!

Create Powerful Builds

Survive the Horde

Quick Turn Chess Movement

Find Broken Builds

Die, Learn, Repeat

Features

  • Chess based enemies and player movement
  • Unique runs by choosing a Character, Starting Ability, and Relic
  • Casual quick 10-21 minute play sessions, for busy gamers.
  • Unlock new characters, cosmetics, and relics
